summary.para: URL used for api calls to themoviedb.org.
DO NOT use the .org/4/ endpoint as it does not contain all operations.
TheMovieDb.org v4 API uses an Authorization Bearer token to query themoviedb.org API.
The Bearer token is found in your account page, under the API section: "API Read Access Token (v4 auth)".
This token IS NOT the same as the old "API Key (v3 auth)"
